entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Farnham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Granby 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: SW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
